attributes.action: ban the re-sale of concert/gig/theatre/sport/events tickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Making the resale of concert tickets illegal to stop people buying extra tickets and selling on e-bay at increased prices.

In conjunction require a venue to try and re-sell a ticket at face value if the owner cannot attend.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the re-sale of concert/gig/theatre/sport/events tickets."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11992.asp

Prime Minister's Office
